verses.verse: For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and will yet <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H3240>set<s%> them in their own <S%H127>land<s%>: and the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> shall be <S%H3867>joined<s%> with them, and they shall <S%H5596>cleave<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> them, and <S%H935>bring<s%> them to their <S%H4725>place<s%>: and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H5157>possess<s%> them in the <S%H127>land<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for <S%H5650>servants<s%> and <S%H8198>handmaids<s%>: and they shall take them <S%H7617>captives<s%>, whose <S%H7617>captives<s%> they were; and they shall <S%H7287>rule<s%> over their <S%H5065>oppressors<s%>. whose: Heb. that had taken them captives

And it shall come to pass in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall give thee <S%H5117>rest<s%> from thy <S%H6090>sorrow<s%>, and from thy <S%H7267>fear<s%>, and from the <S%H7186>hard<s%> <S%H5656>bondage<s%> wherein thou wast made to <S%H5647>serve<s%>,

That thou shalt take <S%H5375>up<s%> this <S%H4912>proverb<s%> against the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, How hath the <S%H5065>oppressor<s%> <S%H7673>ceased<s%>! the golden <S%H4062>city<s%> <S%H7673>ceased<s%>! proverb: or, taunting speech golden: or, exactress of gold
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H4294>staff<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, and the <S%H7626>sceptre<s%> of the <S%H4910>rulers<s%>.

He who <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> in <S%H5678>wrath<s%> with a <S%H1115>continual<s%> <S%H5627><s%> <S%H4347>stroke<s%>, he that <S%H7287>ruled<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> in <S%H639>anger<s%>, is <S%H4783>persecuted<s%>, and <S%H1097>none<s%> <S%H2820>hindereth<s%>. a continual: Heb. a stroke without removing
The whole <S%H776>earth<s%> is at <S%H5117>rest<s%>, and is <S%H8252>quiet<s%>: they break <S%H6476>forth<s%> into <S%H7440>singing<s%>.

Yea, the fir <S%H1265>trees<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> at thee, and the <S%H730>cedars<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>, saying, Since thou art laid <S%H7901>down<s%>, no <S%H3772>feller<s%> is come <S%H5927>up<s%> against us.

<S%H7585>Hell<s%> from beneath is <S%H7264>moved<s%> for thee to <S%H7125>meet<s%> thee at thy <S%H935>coming<s%>: it stirreth <S%H5782>up<s%> the <S%H7496>dead<s%> for thee, even all the chief <S%H6260>ones<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; it hath raised <S%H6965>up<s%> from their <S%H3678>thrones<s%> all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>. Hell: or, The grave chief: Heb. leaders, or, great goats
All they shall <S%H6030>speak<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> unto thee, Art thou also become <S%H2470>weak<s%> as we? art thou become <S%H4911>like<s%> unto us?

Thy <S%H1347>pomp<s%> is brought <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7585>grave<s%>, and the <S%H1998>noise<s%> of thy <S%H5035>viols<s%>: the <S%H7415>worm<s%> is <S%H3331>spread<s%> under thee, and the <S%H8438>worms<s%> <S%H4374>cover<s%> thee.

How art thou <S%H5307>fallen<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, O <S%H1966>Lucifer<s%>, <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H7837>morning<s%> <S%H3213><s%>! how art thou cut <S%H1438>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>, which didst <S%H2522>weaken<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%>! O Lucifer: or, O day star

For thou hast <S%H559>said<s%> in thine <S%H3824>heart<s%>, I will <S%H5927>ascend<s%> into <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, I will <S%H7311>exalt<s%> my <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%>: I will <S%H3427>sit<s%> also upon the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, in the <S%H3411>sides<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%>:
I will <S%H5927>ascend<s%> above the <S%H1116>heights<s%> of the <S%H5645>clouds<s%>; I will be <S%H1819>like<s%> the most <S%H5945>High<s%>.
Yet thou shalt be brought <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>hell<s%>, to the <S%H3411>sides<s%> of the <S%H953>pit<s%>.

They that <S%H7200>see<s%> thee shall narrowly <S%H7688>look<s%> upon thee, and <S%H995>consider<s%> thee, saying, Is this the <S%H376>man<s%> that made the <S%H776>earth<s%> to <S%H7264>tremble<s%>, that did <S%H7493>shake<s%> <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%>;

That <S%H7760>made<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> as a <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and <S%H2040>destroyed<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> thereof; that <S%H6605>opened<s%> not the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H615>prisoners<s%>? opened: or, did not let his prisoners loose homeward?
All the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, even all of them, <S%H7901>lie<s%> in <S%H3519>glory<s%>, every <S%H376>one<s%> in his own <S%H1004>house<s%>.

But thou art cast <S%H7993>out<s%> of thy <S%H6913>grave<s%> like an <S%H8581>abominable<s%> <S%H5342>branch<s%>, and as the <S%H3830>raiment<s%> of those that are <S%H2026>slain<s%>, thrust <S%H2944>through<s%> with a <S%H2719>sword<s%>, that go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H68>stones<s%> of the <S%H953>pit<s%>; as a <S%H6297>carcase<s%> trodden under <S%H947>feet<s%>.

Thou shalt not be <S%H3161>joined<s%> with them in <S%H6900>burial<s%>, because thou hast <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> thy <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H2026>slain<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%>: the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H7489>evildoers<s%> shall <S%H5769>never<s%> be <S%H7121>renowned<s%>.

<S%H3559>Prepare<s%> <S%H4293>slaughter<s%> for his <S%H1121>children<s%> for the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>; that they do <S%H1077>not<s%> <S%H6965>rise<s%>, nor <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, nor <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> with <S%H6145>cities<s%> <S%H5892><s%>.

For I will rise <S%H6965>up<s%> against them, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, and cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H894>Babylon<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%>, and <S%H7605>remnant<s%>, and <S%H5209>son<s%>, and <S%H5220>nephew<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

I will also <S%H7760>make<s%> it a <S%H4180>possession<s%> for the <S%H7090>bittern<s%>, and <S%H98>pools<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>: and I will <S%H2894>sweep<s%> it with the <S%H4292>besom<s%> of <S%H8045>destruction<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> hath <S%H7650>sworn<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Surely as I have <S%H1819>thought<s%>, so shall it come to pass; and as I have <S%H3289>purposed<s%>, so shall it <S%H6965>stand<s%>:

That I will <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H804>Assyrian<s%> in my <S%H776>land<s%>, and upon my <S%H2022>mountains<s%> tread him under <S%H947>foot<s%>: then shall his <S%H5923>yoke<s%> <S%H5493>depart<s%> from off them, and his <S%H5448>burden<s%> <S%H5493>depart<s%> from off their <S%H7926>shoulders<s%>.

This is the <S%H6098>purpose<s%> that is <S%H3289>purposed<s%> upon the whole <S%H776>earth<s%>: and this is the <S%H3027>hand<s%> that is stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> upon all the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> hath <S%H3289>purposed<s%>, and who shall <S%H6565>disannul<s%> it? and his <S%H3027>hand<s%> is stretched <S%H5186>out<s%>, and who shall turn it <S%H7725>back<s%>?
In the <S%H8141>year<s%> that <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H4194>died<s%> was this <S%H4853>burden<s%>.

<S%H8055>Rejoice<s%> not thou, whole <S%H6429>Palestina<s%>, because the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of him that <S%H5221>smote<s%> thee is <S%H7665>broken<s%>: for out of the <S%H5175>serpent's<s%> <S%H8328>root<s%> shall come <S%H3318>forth<s%> a <S%H6848>cockatrice<s%>, and his <S%H6529>fruit<s%> shall be a <S%H8314>fiery<s%> <S%H5774>flying<s%> <S%H8314>serpent<s%>. cockatrice: or, adder

And the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of the <S%H1800>poor<s%> shall <S%H7462>feed<s%>, and the <S%H34>needy<s%> shall lie <S%H7257>down<s%> in <S%H983>safety<s%>: and I will <S%H4191>kill<s%> thy <S%H8328>root<s%> with <S%H7458>famine<s%>, and he shall <S%H2026>slay<s%> thy <S%H7611>remnant<s%>.

<S%H3213>Howl<s%>, O <S%H8179>gate<s%>; <S%H2199>cry<s%>, O <S%H5892>city<s%>; thou, whole <S%H6429>Palestina<s%>, art <S%H4127>dissolved<s%>: for there shall <S%H935>come<s%> from the <S%H6828>north<s%> a <S%H6227>smoke<s%>, and none shall be <S%H909>alone<s%> in his appointed <S%H4151>times<s%>. none: or, he shall not be alone appointed: or, assemblies

What shall one then <S%H6030>answer<s%> the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> of the <S%H1471>nation<s%>? That the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H3245>founded<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, and the <S%H6041>poor<s%> of his <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H2620>trust<s%> in it. trust: or, betake themselves unto it
